name: I Take Stew (Gaming Project at VT)
name_original: I Take Stew (Gaming Project at VT)
description:
A game by Saunders Cox, Brandon Hale, Madeleine Houser, and Isaac Thompson.

You control two rats - two hungry, homeless rats, desperate to feed their starving civilization. The smell of stew pours out of restaurants everywhere. You must steal as much stew as possible for the sake of your colony!

Controls:

WASD - Rat 1

Arrow Keys - Rat 2
